text:
Message 198 of 4024
Expectations: Only discuss shared items where we have dependencies on each other. In the case of possible disagreement, we follow guidelines
discussed last night. Either party can stop the conversation at any time. We treat each other with dignity and respect and speak as if we were talking to
our boss in fear of losing our job.
Robert to keep looking at Eastside places
Agree on move-out plans, timelines
Kirkland Ave
Alki
Christine's thoughts on the parenting plans?
Robert to get a medical spending card
Robert to reach out to SAAS Admissions
Robert to install the microwave and furnace
Do we need anything for unemployment? CC thoughts?
Robert gets BofA account, Max check & 3.5k transfer
Robert's birthday, Max is gone, AD spends with Dad
Christine's Whistler plans for late Jan- Max and AD
Next steps for Hoops and Skiing logistics
Comms expectations for us near term
Robert to Kick off therapy investigations
DBT (both)
Communication counseling (both)
Child Therapy (Max & Adrian)
Substance Use Counseling (robert)
Child-Led Reunification (robert & max)
Robert sent Alki email; our next steps?
Anything else? If we do this well, we unblock shared items and accelerate our decoupling like we both really would like to do. We need space right
now.
Sent:01/03/2024 at 08:21 AM
From:Robert Moyer
To:Christine Moyer (First Viewed: 01/03/2024 at 08:24 AM)
Subject:Running List
Message 199 of 4024
Thanks for the heads up. If you have the place Friday-Sunday, a Saturday AM drop seems like the day you wake up after checking in. So not sure it
pencils out. You would have to leave as soon as you get there. Let’s discuss. I ideally want him to honor hoops commitments as we discussed, but I’m
not going to be a dick about “my time” if we want to work together on a hot swap. Let’s partner.
Sent:01/03/2024 at 08:26 AM
From:Robert Moyer
